name: Knight of Justice
description:
This time the war is not with super villains but something much worse, terrorists. Being the knight of justice and a dark enforcer, you have to co-operate with the police to solve the mystery, collecting clues, of bombs in the city and stop the terrorists.

The criminal underworld universe is merciless and they have released suicide bombers in the city. Hunt your prey like a bat and fight as a hero. Time is of the essence so wait no more and stop the madness of terror.

FEATURES:
• An intriguing story
• Action and thrill filled gameplay
• Solve the mystery of crimes with help of police
• Smooth and responsive controls
• Battle the bad guys in a big city environment
• Action packed HD Graphics
• Free to play forever
• Action and battle music and sound effects
• No In-App Purchases
• No Wi-Fi required
and much more…
